alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Erie; Huron; Richland; Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 11:52PM EDT until August 24 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR NORTHERN RICHLAND...HURON...EASTERN SENECA...ERIE...NORTHERN ASHLAND AND SOUTHEASTERN SANDUSKY COUNTIES... At 1152 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bellevue to near Shelby, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Sandusky, Ashland, Norwalk, Shelby, Bellevue, Clyde, Willard, Ontario, New London, Plymouth, Northern Milan, Milan, Castalia, Savannah, Greenwich, Monroeville, Attica, Bay View and North Fairfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Erie; Huron; Richland; Sandusky; Seneca
